1.1.0.name: wordpress/shiny-buttons
1.1.0.description:
Shiny Buttons will help you to generate CSS3 Button from you wordpress admin simple using GUI, no need to write any css code.

Features

  • GUI to generate gradient affect
  • Google web font support
  • Unlimited button styles
  • Custom front size selection

Support Forum

http://wpeden.com/forums/forum/general-questions/
